text: Dahi laangi hua, gei ogo Adonijah ga tigidaumaha ana siibi, kau daane mo nia damaa kau pedi i di Hadu go Zoheleth, e hoohoo gi di Monowai Uwa aga go En Rogel. Mee gu haga gahi mai nia dama daane a King David ala i golo, mono dagi aamua ala mai di madawaawa Judah, bolo gi lloomoi gi tagamiami tigidaumaha deenei.
